East: Training Dojo and Heaven's Step Mountain
For some reason, the Goddess Coins from Heaven's
Step Mountain sell for immense profit.
My supplier suggested I trade for them with Heroes
and Hero Trainees if I met any.
The goods I found to trade, though... I don't remember
These skill scrolls called [Debug] seem dangerously
powerful. I'm not sure what the word means.
Also these [Level Up Boosters]... just what are they?
